    Fine structure constant: α = e²/(4πε₀ℏc) ≈ 1/137

    heisenbergUncertainty()

    static Real
    rydbergWavelength(int n1, int n2)
    Rydberg formula for hydrogen spectral lines: 1/λ = R(1/n₁² - 1/n₂²)
